entry.string: Your PHP configuration does not seem to include the required XSLT extension. Please refer to http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.xslt.php on how to install it.
entry.translation: Tu configuración PHP no parece incluir la extensión requerida XSLT. Por favor refiérete a http://www.php.net/manual/en/ref.xslt.php sobre como instalarla.
